description: This file defines React components related to 3D cloud visualization, including individual cloud objects and a field of clouds for rendering in a Three.js scene. It includes functions for cloud behavior, rendering, and interaction detection.

methods.name: dist3(a = [0, 0, 0], b = [0, 0, 0])
methods.description: Computes the Euclidean distance between two 3D points.

methods.name: Cloud({ position = [0, 25, 0], color = "#ffffff", opacity = 0.95, scale = 1.0, radius = 2.0, castShadow = false, receiveShadow = false, })
methods.description: A React component representing a cloud composed of multiple spheres that can detect camera fly-throughs.

methods.name: CloudsField({ count = 8, radius = 80, innerRadius = 20, y = 25, color = "#ffffff", opacity = 0.95, scaleRange = [0.8, 2.2], castShadow = false, receiveShadow = false, })
methods.description: A React component that generates multiple Cloud components distributed in a circular area.
